string-array.name: testers
string-array.item: Cliff Wade|Avid tester of the best clock widget available, One More Clock, and site founder of http://AndroidDissected.com
Gusta|Lol :-) what have i done to deserve your credits page? :-)
John P. & Alicja Rushton|Enthusiast testers of the best Android Clock App out there! https://www.facebook.com/JohnyNL
Justin Kirk|Kindle Fire tester of this wonderful, colorful widget. I am glad to be a tester!
Mark Chalmers|My life is now complete!
Patrick Neumann|This strange guy sitting in the corner of a pub, flashing, installing, testing random stuff on his phone.
Sung Choi|I would like a shout-out to Sunny Kwong! Thanks for your amazing support and giving us best clock widget in the market!
Tommy Muriel|Studio percussionist. Writer. Programmer. Geek.

string-array.name: translators
string-array.item: R_BachmaN|R_BachmaN wants to thank Tyxerakias and jimdem582 for their help.
Stefan Pledl|Developer of SIP HorsePower Dyno, find \'dak\' at www.germanscooterforum.com to get in touch with me.
Sunny Kwong|You know? That app that shows a clock on all those phones that already have clocks, except it eats battery and loses time every few hours? Yeah, I wrote that.
